title: Software Engineer - Backend
duties: ★ Provide data to Frontend used in designing templates and Ad designs.
★ Created services for authenticating users on the Backend following microservices architecture.
★ Perform code reviews for quality and conformance to standards on the Backend.
★ Implemented API integration for two factor authentication on Lolly platform.
★ Implemented third party API integration for payments.

title: Software Engineer - Frontend
duties: ★ Brought user story designs to life using Html, CSS and Angular.
★ Implemented creation, modification and trash feature for Ad designs.
★ Implemented toolbar feature, used for modifying Ad designs, on Lolly’s image editor.
★ Created a useful component and managed existing internal Frontend library components.
★ Perform code reviews on the Frontend in order to meet set standards and troubleshoot UI issues

title: Software Engineer
duties: ★ Follow standard Software Engineering practices to build company products with appropriate technology stack.
★ Implemented third party API integration into company products.
★ Attend to customer complaints, with respect to existing company products were necessary.
